## Exploration P.3 --- "Cars or Goats?"

On the game show *Let’s Make a Deal* (hosted by Monty Hall), new cars were often hidden behind one of three doors. Behind the other doors were lesser prizes. The contestant picked one door, and if they chose correctly, they won the car!
